Package io.github.jgame.gameLogic

Class GameAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.jgame.gameLogic.GameAction
  • public abstract class GameAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Support for actions, something that take some time to complete and have a cooldown before they can be used again.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) long cooldown
      The amount of time you have to wait before this action can be done again
      (package private) long duration
      The amount of time the action takes to complete.
      (package private) int id
      The action id.
      (package private) long latestUse
      The last time the action was used.
      (package private) ActionManager parent
      The parent.
      int priority
      Can be assigned outside of constructor, and used to determine if this action should interrupt the ongoing action.
      (package private) long progress
      The amount of time that has elapsed since the action was last done.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameAction​(int type, long duration, long cooldown)
      Action that takes duration to complete has a cooldown timeout after use

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      long getCooldown()
      Get the amount of time left before the action can be used again.
      void onFinish()
      Called when the action is completed properly.
      void onInterrupt()
      Called when the action is interrupted.
      void onReject​(java.lang.String reason)
      Called when the action is rejected.
      void onStart()
      Called when the action is started.

      Called every ActionManager.tick().

    • Field Detail

      • priority

        public int priority
        Can be assigned outside of constructor, and used to determine if this action should interrupt the ongoing action.

        Example usage would be: actionManager.doAction(action, action.priority &gt; actionManager.currentAction.priority, true);

        See ActionManager

      • latestUse

        long latestUse
        The last time the action was used. Used to calculate the cooldown.

      • duration

        long duration
        The amount of time the action takes to complete.

      • cooldown

        long cooldown
        The amount of time you have to wait before this action can be done again

      • progress

        long progress
        The amount of time that has elapsed since the action was last done. Used for cooldown

      • id

        int id
        The action id.

      • parent

        ActionManager parent
        The parent. Is null when the action is not being done.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameAction

        public GameAction​(int type,
                  long duration,
                  long cooldown)
        Action that takes duration to complete has a cooldown timeout after use
        Parameters:
        type - integer containing the action type. (identifier)
        duration - duration in miliseconds
        cooldown - timeout after use in miliseconds

    • Method Detail

      • getCooldown

        public long getCooldown()
        Get the amount of time left before the action can be used again.
        Returns:
        Time in milliseconds

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Called every ActionManager.tick(). See ActionManager

      • onStart

        public void onStart()
        Called when the action is started.

      • onFinish

        public void onFinish()
        Called when the action is completed properly.

      • onReject

        public void onReject​(java.lang.String reason)
        Called when the action is rejected.
        Parameters:
        reason - The reason the action was rejected.

      • onInterrupt

        public void onInterrupt()
        Called when the action is interrupted.
